titleStmt.title: Severall letters from Col. Gen. Poyntz. Lieu. Gen. Cromwell. [brace] and [brace] Col. Hutchison. Col. Whitt. of the late great victory neere Sherborne in the north, with some other happy successes in the west. Printed according to the originall, together with an order of both Houses for thanksgiving for the same. Die Sabbathi 25. Octob. 1645. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that these letters, with the order for the thanksgiving, beforthwith printed and published. Joh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.

Severall letters from Col. Gen. Poyntz. Lieu. Gen. Cromwell. [brace] and [brace] Col. Hutchison. Col. Whitt. of the late great victory neere Sherborne in the north, with some other happy successes in the west. Printed according to the originall, together with an order of both Houses for thanksgiving for the same. Die Sabbathi 25. Octob. 1645. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that these letters, with the order for the thanksgiving, beforthwith printed and published. Joh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: Poyntz, Sydenham.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright at the Kings head in the old Bayley.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
